p.span: Finds the most appropriate concept for the value "datafield" in the "context" from a "container" with "scope" by "class".
Returns the name of the concept, in class 'dest_port' of the context 'count_by_dest_port_1d', in the container 'network_traffic', that best matches the data in the field 'count".
